channel.title: Client Error
channel.description: In my client for other user's of it it say's "error connecting to server" for me on the other hand it says " no response from the server please try using a diffrent world" what do i do to fix this? i know i have port fowarded correctly.

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

For the other player, your source isnt hosted. For you, you need to connect with your OWN client with the ip set as 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error

In my client for other user’s of it it say’s “error connecting to server” for me on the other hand it says " no response from the server please try using a diffrent world" what do i do to fix this? i know i have port fowarded correctly.
